title: Ep  118: Last Week's Top Buys! Old Navy Overalls, Liquid Collagen, NEST Candles!
itunes:title: Ep  118: Last Week's Top Buys! Old Navy Overalls, Liquid Collagen, NEST Candles!
itunes:subtitle: Week of March 7, 2022
description:
Welcome to another episode of Top Buys, a weekly Gee Thanks! episode highlighting the top 3 purchases podcast listeners and the Gee Thanks! community at large bought the week before. 


Without further ado, here are the top 3 buys from the week of March 7, 2022:


  1. NEST everything! 25% off right now and stack 10% off on top of that with code GeeThanks10: https://tidd.ly/3u69Rbt Most popular are the 3-wick Med. Fig candle and the Grapefruit (a classic!)
  2. ALGENIST LIQUID GENIUS COLLAGEN! 25% off right now and stack 10% off on top of that with code GeeThanks10: https://tidd.ly/3Ji9ZeH 
  3. OLD NAVY OVERALLS! https://rstyle.me/+2tpNo0Vtcu_nx-n5STN7xw 


BONUS: My favorite jeans (and listen to find out exactly what to look for!): https://rstyle.me/+tIK3A4zqwQUatSOMj0PLlA 


Shop our Amazon Storefront: https://www.amazon.com/shop/geethanksjustboughtit 


Gee Thanks! appreciates its supporters, especially Alley Peplinski, Becca Sheaffer, Allie Nagy, Angi James and Erin Gibson! 


Want to support? Join the Patreon! Sign up: https://www.patreon.com/geethanksandfriends** 


Join the Facebook group: https://www.facebook.com/groups/geethanks 


Follow along with recs (and share your own via DM) on the “Gee Thanks, Just Bought It!” Instagram: www.instagram.com/geethanksjustboughtitpod and shop all of our recs here: www.geethanksjustboughtit.com 



Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
